item.title: On the conservatism of academics
item.description:
Liam Bright on Twitter

“I’ve said before that I think that most academics doing similar jobs to me are *de facto* conservatives. A short thread on what I mean by this.”

URL: https://twitter.com/lastpositivist/status/1584821912554811393

Heather Knight on Twitter
item.description:
Heather Knight on Twitter

“San Francisco must give back a $15 million grant it received from the federal government to improve Market Street because it can’t start construction by the required deadline -- which is three years away. Hey, that could have bought nine toilets! https://t.co/G0p6OSdDkx”

URL: https://twitter.com/hknightsf/status/1585047997137944578

Although Rishi Sunak is a Hindu, he will still be able to advise the King on ecclesiastical appointments. Only Jews and Roman Catholics are barred from doing so by statute.
item.description:

item.title: Before this attack, I had thought that I could take on a bear easily…
China is publishing fewer economic indicators
item.description:

“China is becoming much less transparent about its economic performance, publishing fewer economic indicators.”

item.title: Tom Gara on Twitter
item.description:
Tom Gara on Twitter

“A brief Googling suggests Rishi Sunak, Emmanuel Macron, Olof Scholz, Vladimir Putin and Volodymyr Zelensky are all 5′7, it’s an unprecedented consolidation of European power in the hands of short kings”

URL: https://twitter.com/tomgara/status/1584565847112437762

item.title: “New Right” response to me on elites
The Woke vs. astrology
item.description:
Matt Baldwin 🏴‍☠️ on Twitter

“@angelicabastien This is a perfect example of why I call astrology “a socially-acceptable form of soft bigotry,” and refuse to have anything to do with it. It’s a system that encourages prejudice.”
